Name: The Tower
About the game: You have been trapped in a mysterious tower by an ancient chicken deity. This tower is home to many pools of lava, floating death balls, spike traps, and more. Fight hordes of chickens, gather loot and resources to upgrade your gear, and escape the tower, or else be trapped in there forever! The Tower includes: - Combat system - Crafting system - Save/load system - Obstacle courses - Major Boss fight - Status effects - Leveling system
Meta Title: The Tower: Nov 8, 2022, Thomas Tavera and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Tower? Check out the release date (Nov 8, 2022), developer insights from Thomas Tavera, and a complete game summary.
